page.description: Define a data series. Data series serve as inputs to several different types of UX controls (Charts, etc.)
page.discussion: Data series are used by many controls in a the UX Component to display data, such as a chart. The *[ui:Data series]* property is used to create data series.

section.description: Click the [...] button to open the *[ui:Data Series Definition]* dialog. The *[ui:Data Series Definition]* dialog is used to create, modify, and manage data series defined in the UX Component.
Data series can be defined as Static values or dynamically generated from a database query, JavaScript function, or Custom Xbasic function.

ref.link: how to add a chart to a ux component

see.ref: How to Add a Chart Control to a UX Component
